Class ZombieLeg

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
        • game.ZombieLimb
          • game.ZombieLeg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, Weapon, ItemInterface

    public class ZombieLeg
extends ZombieLimb
    Class representing a Zombie arm that can be used as a weapon once dropped to the ground.
